DomainName.description: The managed domain name of the Azure AD

AdminUserUPN.description: The UPN of an administrator in the Azure AD

ResourceGroupName.description: The resource group name to create for hosting the Azure AD Domain Service

VirtualNetworkName.description: The virtual network to create for the Azure AD Domain Service

NetworkSecurityGroupName.description: The network security group to create for the Azure AD Domain Service

ManagementSubnetName.description: The management subnet for hosting the management virtual machine

Location.description: The Azure location for hosting the resources

Names.description: The name of the management virtual machine(s) to create

Size.description: The size of the management virtual machine(s) to create
